definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create

sentences.english: Thanks to the many talented people who have shared their recipes with us.
sentences.chinese: 在此還要感謝曾經與我們分享這些原創食譜的天才們。

sentences.english: Only original posts can be added as Elite posts.
sentences.chinese: 只有優秀的原創帖子可以考慮加精處理。

sentences.english: Fruity-bitter cocktail based on rum, original and different.
sentences.chinese: 朗姆味的水果苦酒雞尾酒，原創的，與衆不同的。

sentences.english: Creativity and originality have put Taiwan's music scene ahead.
sentences.chinese: 創意和原創性讓臺灣歌壇發展持續向前進。

sentences.english: Screenplays can be categorized as original or adapted.
sentences.chinese: 劇本可以分爲原創和改編兩大類。

sentences.english: Melody of the Night is a series of original pieces composed by Mr Shijin.
sentences.chinese: 夜的鋼琴曲系列爲石進先生原創作品。

sentences.english: The CD also includes three original pieces written by Jennifer Grady.
sentences.chinese: 該光盤還包括詹妮弗格雷迪寫了三首原創作品。

sentences.english: To come up with more creative and innovative designs?
sentences.chinese: 還是想出更原創性和革新性的設計？

sentences.english: There are certainly some original thoughts here but they are totally wrong.
sentences.chinese: 這裏當然有一些原創的想法但是它們完全是錯的。

sentences.english: We should organize the originalism designers ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 原創設計師靠我們去組織。

sentences.english: Moreover, not everybody can be an original artist.
sentences.chinese: 此外，並非人人都可以成爲原創藝術家。

sentences.english: He also writes his own amusing comments and observations.
sentences.chinese: 同時他還要寫下自己原創的趣味點評。

sentences.english: He was original even in the way he found his pleasures.
sentences.chinese: 即使在發現樂趣方面，他也是有原創性的。

sentences.english: Madonna is a creative force of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 麥當娜是感情的原創力。

sentences.english: Rectification means the whole designer should study Originalism through criticism and self-criticism.
sentences.chinese: 整風就是設計師通過批評和自我批評來學習原創主義。

sentences.english: This is where the whole begin with the end in mind thing confuses people.
sentences.chinese: 這便是結症的開始，最終使得創意讓原創者迷惑。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
